title: ContentDeliveryNetworkClientData
description: Schema that describes data originated from a CDN client.

channel_id.description: Issued by a server in response to a client’s request made to the server.

timestamp.description: Identifies when a certain event occurred, usually giving date and time of day

host_id.description: Technology that enables the client to watch, create and share videos in real time.

content_type.description: Indicate the original media type of the resource (prior to any content encoding applied for sending).

user_id.description: the client which is accessing the service provided by the CDN provider.
